column4: Okay, here's what I found so far, but I REALLY don't want to turn up a Dell since I've badmouthed it so long, there'd be no living with these people!  It's a Dell with a 2.4ghz Celeron, 256MB ram, 80gb hd, 17" monitor....only $299...thing is it comes with windows.  I need to get 20 identical models for $250 each that are as good as or better than this system
i would definately get that. even with windows.. linux is just a dd away
I can get a better deal.  Dell SUCKS and so does celeron
